abstract: South Korea’s Posco is set to clinch its biggest acquisition with a $3 billion deal to buy Daewoo International, as the world’s No.4 steelmaker tries to grab raw materials and boost sales overseas, Reuters reported.
snippet: South Korea’s Posco is set to clinch its biggest acquisition with a $3 billion deal to buy Daewoo International, as the world’s No.4 steelmaker tries to grab raw materials and boost sales overseas, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: South Korea’s Posco is set to clinch its biggest acquisition with a $3 billion deal to buy Daewoo International, as the world’s No.4 steelmaker tries to grab raw materials and boost sales overseas, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Korean Steelmaker Set to Buy Daewoo International
